title: Gradual Instructional Design for Understanding Venous Return Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic blood circulation structure and pressure concepts, general knowledge of biomechanics
context.additional_context: Emphasizing the cultivation of pre-service teachers' ability to apply physiological principles using mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three factors determining mean circulatory filling pressure (MCFP) in the vascular system.
Learners can graphically represent the effects of cardiac output and vascular resistance changes on central venous pressure (CVP).
The impact of oncotic pressure and vascular elasticity on venous return can be simulated using a mathematical model.

resources: Low-Spec PC Blood Pressure Calculation Spreadsheet Template
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
